message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of word recognition in document analysis and recognition, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed approach combines deep learning and conditional random fields (CRFs), which are commonly used in natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR) tasks, suggesting that the paper could also belong to the sub-categories cs.CL, cs.IR, and possibly cs.AI. Finally, the use of deep learning techniques such as stacked restricted Boltzmann machines (RBMs) and online learning algorithms suggests that the paper could also be relevant to the sub-category cs.LG.
